rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious open area connecting the entrance to living spaces, incorporating natural light with large windows and a Mediterranean aesthetic using terracotta tiles and stucco finishes.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen integrated into the living space with a dining island that fosters social interaction, natural ventilation through wide windows and French doors, following Mediterranean design with rustic elements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom with Balcony
rooms.description: The primary bedroom featuring ample natural light, a dedicated balcony overlooking the cityscape, built using warm Mediterranean tones, stonework and wood accents. The Vastu placement ensures energy flow from north-east.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A quiet, well-ventilated space with ample natural light for working, positioned to receive morning sunlight in line with Vastu principles. Furnished with minimalist design and Mediterranean-inspired decor.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom equipped with water-saving fixtures, natural light via skylight, designed with stone accents for a Mediterranean feel and Vastu considerations regarding water placement.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A welcoming entrance door positioned at the south side to invite positive energy, aligned with Mediterranean design aesthetics and Vastu principles.

openings.name: Balcony Access for Master Bedroom
openings.description: Large sliding French doors leading to a spacious balcony that enhances natural light and ventilation in the master bedroom.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Multiple window openings ensuring ample natural light throughout the villa while maintaining privacy and adhering to Vastu principles.
